QuestData.Title: Varsek Recruited
QuestData.Description:
Seems like I'll be able to solve the mysteries of this place just fine in the future.
Let's just never speak of this to Old Grimtusk, OK?
I'll make my way to his hideaway. I think I'll enjoy taking out some pent up aggression on Frostbite.
QuestData.LogDescription: Let Grimtusk know you've recruited Varsek.
QuestData.RewardText: There's Varsek. Guess he finally solved whatever puzzle he was after, eh?
